entry.data:
CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
